pt-BR.description:
This is an Skill to Alexa to show you League of legends elo and division
all you need is to activate this skill, make login with amazon, access https://alexa-lol-league.herokuapp.com/ and place you lol summoner name and region
after call like "Alexa, what is you league of legends elo", and alexa make response "You are in GOLD 2, 95 LP", later the user is sad because he thought he was gold 1
examplePhrases: Alexa, qual meu elo no lol?
pt-BR.name: Qual meu elo no lol
pt-BR.summary: Get you league of legends elo from alexa

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
when you activate the skill, you are redirected to an amazon login, this is only for get the ID, neither name, email or anything is grabbed
after this, with successful you amazon is linked with the skill
now, the program need to know your league of legends nickname, access https://alexa-lol-league.herokuapp.com/, make the same login with amazon, and fill the game nickanme and region, if you dont know anyone, you can use 'thide11' as nickname and 'BR1' as region
After this, you can use the skill
